alert.note: Alert for Watauga; Wilkes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 20 at 6:38AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest North Carolina, including the following counties, Watauga and Wilkes. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Sharp rises on some small creeks and streams can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 636 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to showers and thunderstorms which have persisted across the region throughout much of the night. Flooding remains possible in several areas across the county including Boone, Deep Gap, Beech Mountain, Foscoe, and Sugar Grove. Between 1.0 and 2.0 inches of rain has fallen since midnight. Additional rainfall up to an inch is possible during the next couple of hours. - Boone, Deep Gap, Beech Mountain is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. This includes the following streams and drainages... Brushy Fork, Cove Creek, Craborchard Creek, Dutch Creek, Dugger Creek, Elk Creek, Beaverdam Creek and Beech Creek. Additional rainfall amounts of 1.5 to 2.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Boone... Blowing Rock... Beech Mountain... Todd... Foscoe... Sugar Grove... Deep Gap... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route. When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding, including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter.
